item.title: I-81 NB 29S EXIT RAMP to I-481SB is Restricted @ 3:20 PM due to an accident for upto 2 hours. Onondaga County.
item.description: I-81 NB 29S EXIT RAMP to I-481SB is Restricted @ 3:20 PM due to an accident for upto 2 hours. Onondaga County.

item.title: UPDATE: ROAD CLOSURE: State Hwy 218 in between Cornwall town line & West Point Military Academy due to weather.
item.description: ROAD CLOSURE: State Hwy 218 in between Cornwall town line & West Point Military Academy, in Cornwall, Orange County, closed due to weather conditions, at 2:15am for up to 1 day.
